title: Gigabyte Aero 15 Review - Better than the XPS 15?!
description: Dave2D review of the Aero 15 - the best laptop from Gigabyte for thin and light performance. Features a GTX 1060 like a Razer Blade but with a screen of a Dell XPS 15 9560 Aero 15 -   Note - The paneling is aluminum but the laptop frame is mostly plastic  Laptop GPU Benchmarks -    Music Credits: Intro:  Runaway Nights Background: Fili - Smooth Rides  If you want to support the channel, consider a Dave2D membership by clicking the Join button above!      Purchases made from store links may give me some money.  (It doesnt cost you extra, so please buy everything)
